name: effective world (Singapore) Pte. Ltd.
overview:
The effective world group is an international agency specializing in online communication. effective world Pte. Ltd. Singapore was setup in June 2010. Thus the 6th international branch of the effective world was founded. We help our clients reach and mobilize all of their desired target groups on the world market. Through a single point of contact, we take over the long-term management and maintenance of all your global communication processes. Our services range from analysis, consultation and concept planning, through optimal execution and distribution of your message using the appropriate advertising media, to evaluation and follow-up of results achieved.

The effective world group was established in 1998, making us one of Europeâ€™s pioneers in online communication. Our long-standing clients appreciate the combination of technical knowledge, perfectionism and creativity that we bring to our work, together with maximum efficiency. To ensure that this remains the case, our top priorities are the continual expansion of our knowledge spectrum and the improvement of our processes.

Globalism is a reality that we at effective world experience on a daily basis. We work with partners from a wide variety of cultural contexts, who contribute skills and know-how in diverse fields, thereby creating opportunities for maximum synergies. The spectrum ranges from information technology, business management and linguistics, through media and communication theory, to natural sciences, music and design. With this kind of network, we can navigate any market on earth for our clients. Another reason for our success lies in the way our company is structured: managers and other key personnel at each of our offices have a stake in the company as co-owners. Our clients can therefore rest assured that, no matter where in the world they might be, their concerns will be treated with the same care and dedication.
